version_description:
An exciting update is out NOW!
* Solve puzzles every day and assemble the Weekly Puzzle!
* Collect beautiful images to display in your album!
* Enjoy a new world: Pop-Art!
* VIP users can now access two new EXCLUSIVE worlds: Delicious Pastries and Living Sculptures!

An exciting update is out NOW:
* Enjoy two new worlds - WATERCOLOR ART and KNIGHTS & PRINCESSES!
* VIP players can now access two new EXCLUSIVE worlds: TREKKING and CACTUSES!

* VIP players can now enjoy TWO new worlds!
* Various improvements and bug fixes.

* Behold the exotic animals of the jungle in a new world for all players!
* Get access to new worlds as a VIP subscriber with pictures from Japan and North America, Majestic Waterfalls, and Colorful Fruits!
* Various minor improvements and bug fixes.

* Play two new worlds! Big Cats and Adorable Dogs!
* Share beautiful pictures with your friends.
* Various updates and bug fixes to ensure a smooth gaming experience.

* Unlock any standard world with coins!
* See all world in the list, including VIP ones.
* VIP users get access to two new worlds! "Explore Australia" and "Nature Up Close"
* Many fixes and updates where made to increase games stability and solve various bugs.

* Unlock any standard world with coins!
* See all world in the list, including VIP ones.
* VIP users get access to two new worlds! "Explore Australia" and "Nature Up Close"
* Many fixes and updates where made to increase games stability and solve various bugs.

* New world! Vintage Toys
* New VIP world! Frozen Kingdom
* Various bug fixes and improvements

* Enjoy the brand-new design that makes everything look fabulous!
* Keep your brain sharp by solving fun daily puzzles in Bronze, Silver, and Gold levels to win cool prizes!
* Complete all levels in each world for extra rewards!
* Explore three new worlds with beautiful pictures of horses, flowers, and hedgehogs.
* Share completed Weekly Pictures from your album.
* Conserve storage space with better-optimized images.

* Enjoy the brand-new design that makes everything look fabulous!
* Keep your brain sharp by solving fun daily puzzles in Bronze, Silver, and Gold levels to win cool prizes!
* Complete all levels in each world for extra rewards!
* Explore three new worlds with beautiful pictures of horses, flowers, and hedgehogs.
* Share completed Weekly Pictures from your album.
* Conserve storage space with better-optimized images.

* Enjoy two new worlds: Cute Piggies and Chocolate Oasis
* Live in the moment with a new premium world 'A Moment In Time'
* Russian speaker? We've translated the game into Russian!
* Increased reward for completing worlds!
* All kinds of other small improvements and fixes

* Join the Star Tournament and race other players for awesome rewards!
* Feel the love and adore Fluffy Cats with two new worlds available for all players.
* Explore the continent of Africa in a new VIP world!
* Various improvements to the UI and stability.

* Join the Star Tournament and race other players for awesome rewards!
* Feel the love and adore Fluffy Cats with two new worlds available for all players.
* Explore the continent of Africa in a new VIP world!
* Various improvements to the UI and stability.

* Two new worlds: American Food and Vintage Swag!
* One new Premium World: Explore Jordan!
* Various improvements

* New worlds added: "Dogs in Costumes" and "candy Bliss"!
* New premium world added: Explore Asia!
* Optimizations were made for data management to help keep the game's size smaller. Internet connection is now required to access new worlds, but once downloaded, you can play them offline!
* Other improvements and bug fixes.

* New worlds added: "Dogs in Costumes" and "candy Bliss"!
* New premium world added: Explore Asia!
* Optimizations were made for data management to help keep the game's size smaller. Internet connection is now required to access new worlds, but once downloaded, you can play them offline!
* Other improvements and bug fixes.

* 3 new worlds added! Have fun with monkies, have a close look at food and train your brain with the difficult abstract world!
* various bug fixes and improvements

* Behold nature's beauty with three new worlds! Beautiful Leaves, Golden Sunsets, and Feathered Wonders!
* Various bug fixes and improvements
